resource.chars:
I have examined the 
paper of Mr. Huxley on the 
morphology of the Cephalous 
Mollusca. The author 
has with great research and 
with much ingenuity traced 
the homologies of the different 
organs in various groups of 
the class, particularly in 
several forms of Heteropoda 
and Pteropoda, and has 
shown illustrated in the most 
striking manner, their material 
relations.
